definition: North Korea/Korea as geographic term/Taiwan pr. [Chao2 xian1]
vivid/lively/(of food ingredients) live or fresh

sentences.english: Tore his old wings off with a sigh.
sentences.chinese: 叹息着他撕下自己古老的鲜血淋淋的翅膀。

sentences.english: This is because the water content of fresh day lily have Colchicine can cause poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为鲜黄花菜中含水量有秋水仙碱，会引起中毒。

sentences.english: A study on the processing technology of instant fresh Mifen (rice noodle)had been carried out.
sentences.chinese: 本文对方便鲜米粉的加工技术进行了试验研究。

sentences.english: Regular intake of corn, especially fresh corn, would contribute to the development of brain.
sentences.chinese: 常吃些玉米尤其是鲜玉米，具有健脑作用。

sentences.english: Rinse fresh lotus leaf, tear into small pieces.
Now I have the hands of the do's and fresh turmeric.
sentences.chinese: 现在我的手里有干的和鲜的黄姜。

sentences.english: A bad custom is like a good cake , better broken like kept.
sentences.chinese: 坏习惯就像鲜馅饼，分食要比保存好。

sentences.english: Rinse fresh lotus seeds, soak in hot water until soft, remove piths .
sentences.chinese: 鲜莲子冲水，加入滚水浸至软身，去芯。

sentences.english: To study the effect of Fresh mares milk on the immune function of mice.
sentences.chinese: 研究了鲜马奶对小鼠免疫功能的影响。

sentences.english: Thefirst dish is a spicy and sour seafood pomelo salad.
sentences.chinese: 第一道菜是金柚诲鲜沙律。

sentences.english: Fresh from the super success of"3 Idiots", Aamir has reportedly landed aRs.
sentences.chinese: 从“三白痴超级成功鲜”，阿米尔据报道降落卢比。

sentences.english: Please prepare a bunch of fresh roses for me.
sentences.chinese: 请替我准备一束鲜玫瑰。

sentences.english: North Korea has test-fired five missiles, South Korea's defence ministry has said.
sentences.chinese: 韩国国防部表示，鲜试验已经发射了五枚燃火式导弹。

sentences.english: This paper was to investigate the mutagenicity of KINGPANAX fresh Panax notoginseng juice.
sentences.chinese: 研究了金不换鲜三七液特殊毒理学效应的致突变性。

sentences.english: Daqu production by the addition of fresh distiller's grains could save grains and reduce production cost.
sentences.chinese: 利用添加鲜酒糟生产大曲可节约粮食，降低成本。

sentences.english: We just keep trying to create a better mousetrap.
sentences.chinese: 我们一直在努力经营出自己的“一招鲜”。

definition: umami, one of the five basic tastes (cookery)
fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
to stew in soy sauce and spices

yuxiang, a seasoning of Chinese cuisine that typically contains garlic, scallions, ginger, sugar, salt, chili peppers etc (Although "yuxiang" literally means "fish fragrance", it contains no seafood.)
